data.title: Roster of Active Philippine Scouts in 1945 — Philippine Scouts Heritage Society
data.meta_description: This alphabetical roster of Philippine Scouts lists the PS officers and enlistedmen who were serving during WWII in June 1945. A majority of them survived Bataan and Corregidor. The PSHS has transcribed this from the original National Archives roster to make it easier to search.
data.text:
We’ve stayed true to the original roster, but we made a few tweaks: we wrote out the names of the organizations and filled out some missing information based on digital enlistment records of the National Archives. We hope this helps you with when researching your Philippine Scout.

A few tips when looking through this roster:

This is best viewed on a laptop or desktop computer.

When searching for a particular Scout, press “Ctrl+F” for PC or “Cmd+F” for Mac. Then, type in the last name of your Scout to search this page.
